info.name: Chatwork API Copy
info.description:
The chatwork messaging API

Here, I have collected all of the api from chatwork. You can easily use the API on your own.

First of all,

Before start using the API, you need to know chatwork API authorization flow.

**Basic Auth Flow**

You can easily use the api token get from here -> [https://www.chatwork.com/service/packages/chatwork/subpackages/api/token.php](https://www.chatwork.com/service/packages/chatwork/subpackages/api/token.php)

and authorized the request by provided as a **x-chatworktoken** header on all request.

**OAuth Flow**

The OAuth flows (authorization grant) is also supported. For more information see here -> [https://developer.chatwork.com/docs/oauth](https://developer.chatwork.com/docs/oauth)

For Realtime notification, you might see the webhooks provided by chatwork. For more information ->

[https://developer.chatwork.com/docs/webhook](https://developer.chatwork.com/docs/webhook)

Hope this help you will.

Thank you.

request.description:
Change chat member information

1. member_admin_ids - add more admin or drop some admin
2. member_member_ids - add members or delete some member
3. members_readonly_ids - add read-only member

There are 2 action types

1. leave - Leave the chat room
2. delete - Admin delete the chat room

Send messages to room chat.

Parameters

1. body - the message body
2. self_unread - send messages as read/unread. 0 unread (default), 1 read.

Edit task status.

Parameters

1. body - Completion state of the task.  
    `done`is specified, the task is completed.  
    `open`If is specified, the task will be incomplete.

Add task to the chat.

Parameters

1. body - the message body
2. StartFragmentto_ids - a list of users you want to be assignees.  
    Please specify the account IDs of users belonging to the chat, separated by commas.
3. limit - task deadline.
4. limit_type - The type of due date for the task.  
    `none`will create a task with no due date.  
    `date`If is specified, create a task with a due date.  
    `time`If is specified, creates a time-due task.

Get chat file information.

Parameters

1. create_download_rul - 0 (default), 1 (create)
_The chat room must be enabled the invitation link._

Create a custom invitation link.

Parameters

1. code - the code to use in the invite link
2. need_acceptance - the acceptance from admin use to accept the request. 1 (default), 0 no-need.
3. description - the description of the link.
